title: Formal Learning Center (FLC)
content: This instruction takes place in a Formal Learning Center (FLC) classroom environment. The audience consists of entry-level Marines who require high regimentation and clear, step-by-step instruction.

title: Professional Military Education (PME)
content: The setting is a PME course (e.g., Sergeants School). The audience is experienced NCOs. The instruction should facilitate guided discussion, critical thinking, and peer-to-peer learning strategies.

title: Unit Sustainment Training
content: Training is conducted at the unit level to sustain proficiency in core METLs (Mission Essential Task Lists). Resources are limited to what is organic to the battalion.

title: MCTIMS Implementation
content: The context involves entering or managing data within the Marine Corps Training Information Management System (MCTIMS). Accuracy and data validation are paramount.
